Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory91.png'}
{3: 'By the time Lucia regains consciousness...'}
{3: 'Several humanoid hybrid Constructs from the ARU appear before Lucia, clearing out the remaining Corrupted.'}
{3: 'In the distance, others on the ice begin work on fishing out the Narwhal.'}
{3: "Several Babylonia transport crafts are parked nearby. A few Constructs are assessing Lee's injuries."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Is it... finally over?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "This may not have been an official mission, but with everything we've gone through, it feels like a dream...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ka-cha, ka-cha...'}
{3: "Rosetta's body has been placed inside a Construct bay, with several Forest Guards preparing to take her back."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sailor', 3: "Hey, don't forget... When she wakes up, bring her back for her trial.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Fisher', 3: 'But the rest of you guys are no longer criminals.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Fisher', 3: "Um, I'm sorry... I'll be honest...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Fisher', 3: 'At first, we did refit criminals into Forest Guards, and we treated them harshly.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Fisher', 3: "But as the Corrupted became more dangerous, we were worried that the Forest Guards' resentment toward us would cause them to turn against us...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Fisher', 3: 'Whenever Rosetta came to see the Narwhal at the port...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Fisher', 3: 'Her mere existence would remind the port citizens of what we did to her...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Fisher', 3: 'Not to mention, her imposing... sterrness made her unapproachable...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Fisher', 3: "But seeing everything that you've done for us, we'll no longer harbor any prejudice against you.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Diana', 3: "So that's what it was all about?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: '...No matter what, the ARU is our home, too.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: "Let's learn to coexist from this day forward.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Fisher', 3: "Aye... If it had been you from the beginning, perhaps we'd have accepted the Forest Guards long ago...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sailor', 3: 'What are you going on about...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Hey, Evan, are you going to live with the Forest Guards?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Evan', 3: "I'll come back to the port eventually! But I want to wait for Miss Rosetta to wake up and come back here with her.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Commandant, we should get going.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Wait, pardon the interruption.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Forest Guards... Even though the ARU has always been neutral to Babylonia...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "We still hope to ally with powerful friends such as yourselves to join humanity's effort to fight against the Corrupted and the Punishing Virus.", 4: '1'}
{3: "The Forest Guards exchange looks, but they wait for Diana's response."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Diana', 3: 'We... will consider it. But not right now.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Following that, the Forest Guards disappear into the snowy forest, leaving only their tracks.'}
{3: 'Lucia looks up at the sky and remembers what Alpha whispered into her ear.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: '"I will wait... until that day comes..." What does that mean?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/CgJD06.jpg'}
{3: 'Alpha stands on an iceberg, gazing at the ice floating on the Arctic Ocean.'}
{2: 'System', 3: 'Initiating Punishing relay communication—'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Hello? Do you copy? What's your status? Over."}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Hello? Over.'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Hey, you can hear me, can't you? Over."}
{3: 'Alpha does not know why, but she angrily hangs up on Roland.'}
{3: 'She continues to stare at the ocean in silence, as if a magical creature lurked within.'}
